section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
relevant_communication: Detailed information and reguilar updates are available on www.climmar.com
goals__remit: CLIMMAR is the European umbrella organisation representing several (currently 16) national (dealer) associations in the agricultural machinery and equipment sector. It represents and promotes the interests of the member associations on a European level by co-ordinating the views of the national associations and their members. It provides know-how of the sector to the European institutions and other organisations. It also informs members about the latest developments in related European legislation.
